title: "Machine Madness"
content:
Welcome to Machine Madness, the ultimate destination for lovers of all things dark and mechanical. Our website features a wide variety of content focused on machines, from the latest tech gadgets to the most awe-inspiring industrial marvels.

Whether you're a fan of sci-fi movies, video games, or just appreciate the beauty of machinery, you'll find something to love here. Our community is passionate about all things mechanical, and we're constantly sharing our favorite finds and discussing the latest trends in the world of technology.

So come join us and immerse yourself in the world of machines. From the sleek and modern to the dark and ominous, we've got it all. Get ready to explore the fascinating world of technology and discover the beauty in the machine madness!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of a dark and ominous machine, with glowing red lights and mechanical parts."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
